text: This is the dirtiest cow in the world, and it needs cleaning. Watch as its owner battles through mud and tangles to wash its massive, shaggy coat. It takes five buckets of water and special brushes just to see the cow's eyes again. Left caked in mud for months, this gentle giant patiently stands for hours as layers of dirt wash away. This cow finally transforms from filthiest to famous. Now hit subscribe as
